Articles.Content:
Excited to be playing KSP2!   I have been experiencing random crashes were I have to reboot my PC.  I do not see anything suspicious in the logs.

Running win Pro 10 with 16GB RAM and a GeForce GTX 1070 Ti. 

I see these errors in log: 

[EXC 16:15:55.882] NullReferenceException
    UnityEngine.MonoBehaviour.StartCoroutine (System.Collections.IEnumerator routine) (at <25a85da7c6f04932b86e339dfd12957d>:0)
    KSP.Modules.Module_Drag.OnPartDestroyed (KSP.Messages.MessageCenterMessage obj) (at <8c5bdf369a8c45f68951f69eb825ef73>:0)
    KSP.Messages.MessageCenter.Publish (System.Type type, KSP.Messages.MessageCenterMessage message) (at <8c5bdf369a8c45f68951f69eb825ef73>:0)
    UnityEngine.Debug:LogException(Exception)
    KSP.Messages.MessageCenter:Publish(Type, MessageCenterMessage)
    KSP.Messages.MessageCenter:Publish(PartDestroyedMessage)
    KSP.Sim.impl.PartBehavior:DestroyPart()
    KSP.Sim.impl.PartBehavior:HandlePartDestruction()
    KSP.Sim.impl.PartBehavior:HandleCollisionEnterInternal()
    KSP.Sim.impl.PartBehavior:HandleCollisionEnter(Collision)
    KSP.Sim.impl.PartBehavior:OnCollisionEnter(Collision)

[ERR 16:16:14.060] [Debug] Resource Ablator Does not contain a VXFFuelType! Using default!
